item.title: Real suffer Ronaldo scare ahead of final
item.description: Brace yourself if you're a Real Madrid fan or supporter of the Portuguese national team.
item.ExtractedText: 1 of 6 6 photos: Cristiano Ronaldo limps out of traning Ronaldo is expected to play against Atletico Madrid in the final on May 28, but went down after a challenge with captain Sergio Ramos. Hide Caption 2 of 6 6 photos: Cristiano Ronaldo limps out of traning The three-time World Player of the Year is this season's top scorer in the Champions League with 16 goals, seven ahead of Bayern Munich's Robert Lewandowski in second place. Hide Caption 3 of 6 6 photos: Cristiano Ronaldo limps out of traning Ronaldo is also the all-time top scorer in Champions League history with 94, leading Barcelona rival Lionel Messi, who is in second on 83. Hide Caption 6 photos: Cristiano Ronaldo limps out of traning The Portuguese forward was pictured receiving treatment on his left thigh ... Hide Caption 6 photos: Cristiano Ronaldo limps out of traning Before cutting a disconsolate figure as he trudged off the training pitch on his own. Hide Caption
